item.description:
I am planning on going for a ride 35-40 or so miles out to concord and lexington and back.

My basic plan is down mass ave to rt 225 to concord st and loop around in lexington to come back. Should anyone choose to join me, this will be a no drop ride and I am planning on a 16 mph or so pace (nothing too crazy now!)

Please let me know if you are planning on coming by Sunday at 10 am!
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be hanging out with my bike near JP licks
item.name: 40 or so miler
